name: BROADCOM CORPORATION, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT OF the EASTERN DISTRICT OF TEXAS, et al.
name_abbreviation: Broadcom Corp. v. U.S. Dist. Court of the E. Dist. of Tex.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
BROADCOM CORPORATION, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT OF the EASTERN DISTRICT OF TEXAS, et al.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit for further consideration in light of Atlantic Marine Constr. Co. v. United States Dist. Court for Western Dist. of Tex., 571 U.S. ---- (2013).
casebody.head_matter:
BROADCOM CORPORATION, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT OF the EASTERN DISTRICT OF TEXAS, et al.
No. 12-1475.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 9, 2013.
Case below, 526 Fed.Appx. 960.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit for further consideration in light of Atlantic Marine Constr. Co. v. United States Dist. Court for Western Dist. of Tex., 571 U.S. ---- (2013).
